content: माला [मल् संज्ञायां कर्तरि घञ्] {@--1@} A garland, wreath, chaplet; अनधिगतपरिमलापि हि हरति दृशं मालतीमाला <ls>Vās.</ls> {@--2@} A row, line, series, succession; गंडोड्डीनालिमाला <ls>Māl. 1. 1</ls>; आबद्धमालाः <ls>Me. 9.</ls> {@--3@} A group, cluster, collection. {@--4@} A string, necklace; as in रत्नमाला. {@--5@} A rosary, chain; as in अक्षमाला. {@--6@} A streak; as in तडिन्माला, विद्युन्माला. {@--7@} A series of epithets. {@--8@} (In dramas) The offering of several things to obtain a wish.
